item.title: Optimizing Yamux Flow Control - Sending Window Update Frames Early
item.description:
Below is a summary of our efforts to optimize flow control in the Rust Yamux implementation. While not a novel approach, I still find the end result worth sharing thus my forum post.

https://discuss.libp2p.io/t/optimizing-yamux-flow-control-sending-window-update-frames-early/843
